alert.note: Alert for Baca; Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 2:54PM MDT until May 17 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Baca County in southeastern Colorado... East central Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 345 PM MDT. * At 254 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Kim, or 32 miles west of Springfield, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of western Baca and east central Las Animas Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
